word:
The influence of these messages has been deepening and widening, setting in motion the springs of action in thousands of hearts, bringing into existence institutions of learning, publishing houses, and health institutions; all these are the instrumentalities of God to cooperate in the grand work represented by the first, second, and third 
                                                                           118
angels flying in the midst of heaven to warn the inhabitants of the world that Christ is coming again with power and great glory.
